definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: People around her with his own words and deeds education to protect the environment, take good care of public property.
sentences.chinese: 她用自己的言行教育身边的人保护环境，爱护公物。

sentences.english: We have also destroyed the school public property.
sentences.chinese: 我们也曾经破坏过学校的公物。

sentences.english: A few protesters were reported to have been arrested on charges of theft or vandalism.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，一些反抗者们因为偷盗或者破坏公物被捕。

sentences.english: She took good care of public property and set a good example to all of us.
sentences.chinese: 她爱护公物，给我们所有的人做出了好榜样。

sentences.english: The damage to the painting is the work of vandals .
sentences.chinese: 毁坏这幅画的事是恣意破坏公物的人干的。

sentences.english: Care of public property, canteens and so on must keep a record of all equipment register.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公物，食堂的一切设备等肚缶蓉须造册登记。

sentences.english: He rebuked Lou, director of the stolen property, threatening to the wild man there.
sentences.chinese: 他斥责卢局长私吞公物，扬言要到野夫那里告状。

sentences.english: Protect public assets; treasure resources, be diligent & thrifty, and be committed to common development.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公物，珍惜资源，勤俭节约，共同发展。

sentences.english: We need to consider the problem of vandalism within ar context.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在更广的范围里考虑恣意破坏公物这个问题。

sentences.english: Stop vandalism. Don't scribble on walls.
sentences.chinese: 严禁破坏公物，禁止在墙上乱写乱画。

sentences.english: Some vandals had slashed the seat covers on the passenger car.
sentences.chinese: 一些破坏公物的人将客车上的座套划破了。

sentences.english: Vandals slashed the paintings with knives.
sentences.chinese: 破坏公物者用刀划破了那些绘画作品。

sentences.english: (unlikely) He is known as a good child, so I think he is unlikely to damage public property.
sentences.chinese: 他是个公认的好孩子，所以我认为他不可能破坏公物。

sentences.english: The soldier took good care of public property and set a good example to all of us.
sentences.chinese: 这位战士爱护公物，给我们所有的人做出了好榜样。

sentences.english: Cherish communal establishment, not to mangle public property.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公共设施，不损坏公物。

sentences.english: Take care of public facilities. Do not damage furnishings in the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 爱护公物，请勿损坏乘座舱内的设施。

definition: official authority used for private interests (idiom); to attain private ends by abusing public position
to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense/venal and selfish behavior
to appropriate to oneself (what rightfully belongs to others)
to commandeer/to take over for the state
to take for one's own/to expropriate
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
